website_summaries.verdict: If you like the thought of being able to customize audio options, this rechargeable Bluetooth enabled soother is a great choice.
pros: Bluetooth capability opens up a world of music, voice, and natural sound options
Comes with two built-in tracks and unlocks 14 free tracks on activation
Easily clips onto car seats, strollers, or cribs
Features continuous play and timer options
Soft and safe for babies to play with
cons: The outlet cord could be longer
Without using Bluetooth, you're limited to two white noise tracks

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling white noise, not ideal for everyday, full night use
customer_reviews.text: Two things: 1. Buy this only as your traveling product, not for everyday use as it requires regular charging and is not conducive to running through the entire night. 2. Our daughter likes VERY loud white noise to fall asleep. We then go back and turn it down once she is asleep. Unfortunately, when you turn down the volume it makes a loud clicking sound and can wake baby.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Marsh

customer_reviews.title: This is the best!
customer_reviews.text: My 17 month-old daughter sleeps with this for all her naps and all night. We love it because it is cute, durable (she plays with it and throws it on the floor, but it has survived!), and most of all because it has an infinity loop. Most white noise makers have timers and turn off. With this one, we leave it on for as long as our baby is sleeping. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: David Brading Chalmers

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT. awesome that its able to be charged ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT. awesome that its able to be charged with our phone chargers (MicroUSB). Little one likes to play with it, and it's the perfect size for him to hold. It clips on anything & is the only reason we are able to sleep as well as we do!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Berrios

customer_reviews.title: Love that this is portable
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is portable. I take it with me wherever my baby sleeps...in his room, in the living room, in my bedroom. It's super convenient. I love how you have 2 white noise options (mine prefers the raindrops). You can also stream music from your phone which is great because I can still use my phone from one room, but have his music playing from the SoundBub. Overall, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: millicent725

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND for white noise and travel speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well! Nice sound quality! I use the "rain" or "waves" built in white noise every night for my little one at naptime and bedtime. Love the 30, 60, 90 minute or ON timer options. Can also play while plugged into the charger which is GREAT. Bluetooth works seamlessly with my iphone 7 so I can play classical music playlists when the babe needs to chill. I also attach it to my stroller to listen to podcasts on walks for some "me time." ;p HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Leah M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable white noise machine
customer_reviews.text: This owl is adorable and a great portable white noise machine. We keep this in the diaper bag to use when at other people's houses for nap time to help our baby sleep. It only has two different sounds but you can record your own messages. The only way to play your recorded messages is through Bluetooth - it would be nice if the product could play the recorded messages/sounds without Bluetooth. The price of this product seems a little expensive for what you get, but overall the product works great.
customer_reviews.author: T.Schwab

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth speaker for babe
customer_reviews.text: I am SOOOOO excited for this sound machine. We got stranded without ours in the middle of a trip and this should be super helpful for my kids. Rock music for the babe so mama can get some sleep. This thing has nature sounds, Bluetooth, and volume control. It is AWESOME. Update: We have had this speaker for about 3 weeks now and do not use it at full volume and the speaker is now very distorted. It's rather disappointing after coming to rely on it for bedtime but I'm hesitant to purchase a replacement speaker at the premium price of $35 to have the speaker distort again.... Update: the company replaced the faulty speaker at no charge to me.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Loved it till it died
customer_reviews.text: I received the product on July 3, 2018 and yesterday, November 7, 2018, it died. I guessed that the power had simply run down, but I’ve charged it overnight an I still can’t get it to turn on. It’s quite a shame because it worked quite well. My son (Ollie) slept very well with it, and he’s not been napping well since it died. Plus I loved the fact that the owl was named Ollie!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Quality seems to be an issue
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a year now so I think I can write a good review. Great sound quality, good options for sound and portable. I can put it in the car and the baby used to sleep happily (pre-pandemic). The issue is that the volume control is a roll-on and after a while it just doesn’t stay put. The volume dies in ten middle of the night. I ordered a new one and in this one the sound you set the machine on has to be reset every time you switch it on for the nap! I will keep it as a travel option only and try and get a more reliable one for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Aarwen

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the child in your life
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! Goes to bed everynight with it. You can set it to just run for particular times, only gripe is that it doesn't shut off at the time, you will have to manually click the button over to shut off. Battery life is decent too. Wish there was an external memory card for using the purchased songs, instead you have to use bluetooth to a phone to play songs, other than the built in sounds. Its a great product, with some quirks and lacking some wishful add-ons.
customer_reviews.author: LoveThatDirtyWater

customer_reviews.title: It's fine
customer_reviews.text: This sound machine is pretty good. We like the options for different noises (white noise, static, beach sound, etc.). The battery life is pretty long, and you can recharge it quickly. It's small and portable. And we like that you can prop it up or not. Only complaint is that the sound just suddenly stops after one hour. It would be nice it it faded out. Also, there is a light that starts blinking as soon as the sound turns off. That combined with the sudden silence can be annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Darek

customer_reviews.title: Best sound option I found
customer_reviews.text: I love this sound thing. It has great sound options. I love that it’s rechargeable and doesn’t have to be connected to a cord. Long battery life, about two days worth. One weird thing, sometimes it changes sounds on its own. Also when it’s low on battery it starts playing funny, like half sounds or a mixture of all the sounds. Definitely made me think we have a ghost but more logically it’s a battery related thing. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Christin

customer_reviews.title: dies quickly
customer_reviews.text: doesn't work for long. I got this for my baby and it was great! Until it stopped making any sounds aside from the heartbeat sound then nothing at all. I returned it for an exchange because we still liked its versatility and hoped it was just a fluke. Nope happened with the second one too and that one we rarely used. Luckiky it died within the return period so amazon still refunded the cost to me.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: We love our sound bub!
customer_reviews.text: Bought in February, still working well for us now in mid- May (I held off on reviewing to see if I would have any issues others have noted). It's cute!!! But that's not why we bought it. My kids like to listen to music and this enables us to be able to play music for them while we are in the other room without us having to listen to it. Battery life lasts well. It's definitely been chewed once or twice by my LO too, so far no issues.
customer_reviews.author: A Wasser

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: Had a baby 8 months ago and one of the best things we bought was a white noise machine. Knowing this, we decided to purchase this one for friends of ours who had their baby in Feb and the feedback I received was this: "Redmond has been so cranky today and the sound machine you gave has been the only thing that helps. Otherwise he either wants to be held 24/7 or nursed so it's been a life saver for sure!" No need to say more
customer_reviews.author: Mitul Patel

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Amazing!! My 3 mos old daughter is not a good sleeper currently. She does however sleep longer when music is playing. This device has great sound is super convenient and frees up my phone so I can still use it and not leave it in her bassinet with her. We literally use it all the time. The only criticism I have is that it beeps when it connects to my phone which sometimes startled her a little. Love this speaker!!
customer_reviews.author: kitcatsheart

customer_reviews.title: No white noise
customer_reviews.text: I tried so hard to like this portable "white noise" but there us no white noise !! Runniny water, waves , and some weird sound. Is all there is ! None of these sounds are pleasant to hear and I'm bit dissapointed. Baby doesnt like it either . Will return .. I do like the way it's designed and small and portable. But wish they had more options for such a price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just OK out of box
customer_reviews.text: This is an out of box impression, although some may prefer to invest more time in this device .... not me. Short charge cord means loads of plug/unplug charging hassles Nifty clip to bed/etc. ideal for teens/adults ... but wonder if babies grab it off Only THREE sounds = 1. ocean small waves, 2. rain on pavement, 3. rain into barrel ... really? really? that's it? Like the timer option on switch and side timer length of time options switch Owl aesthetics good
customer_reviews.author: Angelgenie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love our ‘Ollie the Owl’ sound machine! We use it every night while Baby sleeps, & throw it in the diaper bag every where we go so he can sleep in the stroller amidst the chaos of grocery stores to Museums. I LOVE that I can just plug it in to recharge in the morning, & don’t have to waste expensive batteries. The volume adjustment is perfect for quiet nights, & noisy outside events.
customer_reviews.author: AEH

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, easy to use, and soothing
customer_reviews.text: This white noise maker is so cute, and is very easy to use. I love the different sound options it gives. Some noise makers I've used before sound very fake, or have overlaying static over them that is distracting. This noise maker has very clean and crisp sound that is soothing. We bought this for our little 2 week old baby, and he has been sleeping SO much better since we started using it. It's got good volume control, a timer, and even a handy clip so we can hang it on his crib. I highly recommend this noise maker.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan B.

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a long time, and easy to recharge. Also doesn't automatically turn off which is a plus.
customer_reviews.text: Our other baby noise maker automatically turns off after 15 or 30 mins, and this one goes all night which is great to keep our baby sleeping. The charge lasts an entire night, but since it has rechargeable batteries, we just leave it plugged in next to the crib and only unplug it when we move it around the house. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Doran

customer_reviews.title: Such a great gadget!
customer_reviews.text: We love this gadget! I saw some people complaining about the bluetooth not working, but we can use our's clear across the room. For some reason my grandbaby loves country music and we bluetooth Amazon music through it. The sound quality is fine for what it is. Our grandbaby loves to star at it's cute little face. I definitely would buy this for a gift 🎁.
customer_reviews.author: Alasher

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality isn't good at all
customer_reviews.text: The product is good other than the sound quality and volume control. Sound quality is poor and the volume control doesn't work well. Sound goes in and out and you get static sounds when you adjust the sound level. Probably wouldn't suggest this product for that reason. The traveling and portability aspect are the biggest selling point but I don't think it offsets the poor quality of sound you get.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is so close to perfect, but the battery doesn’t last nearly long enough. We’ve had to keep it plugged in over night, but are not sure what to do once baby starts reaching for things outside the crib. That being said, we still use it every day for naps and all night for sleep, got a second one to keep at daycare, and have gifted them to others because it’s been so useful. The built in sounds are good for sleep. Having Bluetooth makes it great for having variety from other noise apps, and we found it really useful for playing music to stay awake when baby was really little and up at all hours of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Paula ORourke

customer_reviews.title: Newer version is not really improved
customer_reviews.text: I owe two of these. The older and the newer version. This review is based on the newer version with six sounds, smaller lights. The reason why I am giving this one a 3 star is because the plastic which the owl is made of is clearer than the older version and even though the light bulbs are smaller the plastic is somewhat see through. I have a particular issue where the sounds change by themselves. I set a particular sound and it would shift after a couple of minutes to a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this product a couple of months ago and I love it! It even makes me fall asleep! The battery will last all night and more. Great product for my baby who sleeps through the night since she uses this (she is 8 months old) and I am buying another one for my oldest daughter. I tried like 3 other white noise machines and this definitely is the best! Buying the 3rd one now. Love this sound machine!
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Portable, & Compact
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up and use. Surprising quality from such an inexpensive little unit. Our baby granddaughter loves to listen to happy music from our iTunes collection whenever we watch her & the Sound Bub Owl always makes her smile!
customer_reviews.author: MJGee

customer_reviews.title: Now switches between sounds, unusable
customer_reviews.text: Let me first say that I purchased one in 2018 for our first child, and it's still going strong being used nightly. We have also taken it on trips and love the ocean sound. I bought another one this year, and apparently changes were made since the plug in feature looks different now. Our new one switches between sound settings about every 20 seconds, disrupting sleep and making it unusable. Upset that I thought I would get the same great white noise owl, and this one is a dud. Wish I returned it, feel like it's wasted money. Whatever changes they made did not improve this product.
customer_reviews.author: Linds L.

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully the Second One will Last
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing! My baby girl likes the water sounds and when I turn it on for bed time it takes her less than 5 minutes to fall asleep. The first one I ordered worked wonderfully for 3 days then the sound cut out and my daughter has to have it on full volume to sleep. I emailed customer service as told and never received a response. I ended up getting a replacement from Amazon and this one seems to work beautifully. Sound is loud and the continuous sound works all night. Hopefully this one will last.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I turned this on she stopped crying and laid her head on my chest. I use this whenever I'm putting my daughter to sleep and leave it on during the night and it definitely has helped her sleep longer throughout the night. The fact it also has a bluetooth is an added bonus. She loves listening to her favorite music on it and so far it's been durable whenever she ends up throwing it. The battery life on it is amazing and lasts for a very long while.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these tiny speakers! The ears and feet are this "chewable" rubber for teething, and the front fabric is super soft. The sound is way better than I expected! My only complaint is about the "on" light...waaayyyy too bright at night. I've colored mine with a dark marker, but it's still brighter than I'd like.
customer_reviews.author: Sus

customer_reviews.title: Give your baby adorable music, not your phone!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker/white noise generator is perfect. Soft and friendly, lets me play music for our little bub without handing over my phone, and the volume can be controlled from a dial on the side, or from my phone. Big belly button provides start/stop control for our little one, and the personality is great. White noise generator also very effective, though she's grown out of this. Been using this great little owl for 18 months strong. Can't reccomend enough.
customer_reviews.author: thisand_that

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is a white noise machine and a blue tooth speaker. I can make my own playlists on my phone for my baby or just turn on one of the white noise sounds it comes with. I use this everyday. The battery life is great (so far). It’s cute and lightweight, and I can take it anywhere. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Vanders

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, bad light
customer_reviews.text: Things I love: the variety of sounds, the volume range, the hanging hook, the common micro USB charger, and the ability to use it wirelessly. Things I don't love: the light!! I use it when baby is sleeping so the room is dark except this obnoxious light! I've taken to hiding it under the crib. Likewise, the volume dial is loud. No hopes of gradually easing it down if baby is asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and works well, but it is kinda tricky to turn on! I have to give instructions on how to use it anytime we have a baby sitter (You have to flip a switch on the top of it to the left - the right will turn on Bluetooth, and then you have to push the belly/speaker in).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, durable and awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This sound machine is amazing! We had an issue with the battery not charging at first, but I requested a return and received the replacement before I even had time to send the faulty one back. But the best part is it's durability- 10 days ago I misplaced it, but yesterday I went for a walk and found it on the sidewalk, I must have left it on the roof of the car. It's been lying in the rain for more than a week and still works perfectly! I'm amazed! Highly recommend this to any parent who's baby struggles to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality on this really isn’t superb but my baby doesn’t seem to mind too much. I guess you could say they sound a bit harsh. We put it on the rain sound because it is the least offensive and has the most consistent sound. I don’t care for the other sound options. It’s also cool that you can hook it up to Bluetooth and play other sounds or music. It has a pretty great battery life and I’ve had no problems with its functionality so far. Plus it’s super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Q.

customer_reviews.title: A nice portable white noise machine
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this white noise machine based on other reviews. I like that it is portable and you can take it with you while you are running errands and the little one is sleeping or even if you go to someone's house for a visit. It looks really pretty and seems to be a good quality. It has a couple of different setting and options for different sounds. So far I have only tested this product and everything seems to work fine, however I haven't used it yet on a daily basis. I will post an update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.. while it worked.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this white noise machine while it lasted... 2 1/2 months. Pro: small, blue tooth, hooks onto most things, soft if baby bumps it, works while plugged in, battery lasts for a few days use naps and through the night. The different setting and timer are great! The sounds are decent as well, we primarily used the rain noise. Con: when the battery starts to die it changes sounds every 5 seconds vs turning off waking everyone up (its pretty creepy in a deep sleep), short lifespan.. after 2 1/2 months use it randomly started rotating sounds, other than blue tooth its unusable for us.. which the rain sound was our primary use.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Conkli

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Cute White Noise Machine
customer_reviews.text: This white noise machine is very cute and thematic. I like how it looks and clips onto the bed. I do not like that it is battery powered and needs to be replaced. I also do not like that it is really just a bluetooth speaker which means it connects and disconnects. I would prefer just a plugin push button white noise.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Williams

customer_reviews.title: My favorite baby purchase
customer_reviews.text: Get a Pandora account and let er rip on all those classical channels!! A life saver!! Charges fast and is well made. I wish you could turn off the little light though. And I would put something softer on it so when baby grabs the handle he doesn't smack and hurt himself. Give this as a gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Casaverde1611

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a lifesaver! My toddler son will not sleep when we are on vacation without it. He also loves the bluetooth feature so that he can play "his own music". Its also very cute and durable and the battery lasts much longer than I expected. And when it does die, that fact that it is rechargeable is really convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Marie

customer_reviews.title: Only 3 sounds... all water.
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this item until I realized it only comes with 3 sounds, and they are all water related. And the app is awful. I was hoping I could download more sounds onto it but could not. Regardless, the kids seem to enjoy it at bedtime. The bluetooth and volume are great.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great product with well designed volume control and sound choices
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It was recommended by a friend as my son needed white noise to sleep. I like that it has the volume control so it does not go too high. I also like that it has different sound settings and doubles as a Bluetooth speaker. The product is well-made and portable. Would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Best Noise Machine for Kids
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best purchases I've made after having my son and I have bought one for each of my friends that had kids. The battery lasts forever (overnight and then some at a full charge), ours is 3 years old and still works great, and it has easy volume control on the side so it's easy for my in-laws to operate it lol. Bluetooth connection was easy and the basic sounds work great. It is a loop but you never notice where it loops. And the handle makes easy to hang in the car or stand it up on a dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Doyle

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: This little white noise machine has been a life saver for us!! My baby knows that when it is on it’s time to go to sleep. She very easily falls asleep in the car seat and stroller as long as the white noise is playing. I bought the same one for my sister in law that is expecting.
customer_reviews.author: LAURA

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery life
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use for traveling and overall I was very disappointed. The battery life was awful and stopped in the middle of the night, which then woke my baby up. Also, the white noise (rain sound) is just not as good as other white noise machine; there was something just off about the sound. I would look at other options.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Helpful but 2 big drawbacks. Sound and flashing light.
customer_reviews.text: Hello, first of all, I want to say this is a very nice going out toy. It gets my baby to sleep but I dont use it at night anymore cause of the flashing white light the goes on an on even after you have set a 60 or 30 minutes clock on it. Also, the thing to adjust the noise is really loud, wakes the baby up, which parents know is really an inconvenience. These two things are the biggest issue with this toy, I believe it can be fixed. When. You have a new prototype, let me know!
customer_reviews.author: Lised

customer_reviews.title: Play white noise or your own playlist for baby
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute. Will play white noise or you can play music from your phone via Bluetooth. Nice that you can recharge it. I first bought a less expensive version that was battery operated. It's worth the extra money to get this rechargeable one. Less waste, money overall, and hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Coyne Catania

customer_reviews.title: Godsend
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally write reviews, but this is easily the best baby purchase I made before having my daughter. We’ve been using this everyday for 16 months for naps and nighttime use, and it’s been a godsend. We’ve only toyed with the other features once or twice, so I can’t speak to the story reading mode, but it’s a great option to have in the future for family members to be able to record themselves reading. I’ll definitely purchase a second to continue using; the battery life is significantly diminished after using it so much, but it’s worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Reardon

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: I take it everywhere, this has been perfect for naps and car rides. Very portable and easy to charge. Considering purchasing another one for daycare and my husband. I have other nose machines but this one gets here instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Talyna Janvier

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The plug in caved in straight out of the box. I wrote to customer service and before I new it, a brand new one arrived in the mail. I would highly recommend this white noise machine. My daughter says her new baby loves it! Says it is very easy to use and very portable.
customer_reviews.author: water freak

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but no true "white noise"
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute and useful sound machine, but it does not come with a default "white noise" option, just rain/water sounds. My daughter seemed to like the rain sound just fine, though. I like that it's rechargeable and can be used both plugged in and wirelessly.
customer_reviews.author: K Davis

customer_reviews.title: Must have for babies who enjoy white noise!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been a God send! Our baby sleeps so much better when we turn this on at night. The white noise soothes him completely, and we love that we can play our own music through it too when we want to have some fun.
customer_reviews.author: TWald88

customer_reviews.title: Our baby girl loves this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing! When our baby was 4 weeks old we purchased this and she has been sleeping through the night until this day! We have been using this White noise machine for almost 6 weeks now. I love how you can adjust the volume and it's mobile!!! That's a huge plus I wanted something we could take with us anywhere and this thing is amazing it has great battery life. I would definitely recommend this, also as baby gets older we can play music for her through Bluetooth which I love that idea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would like this more for the price. It comes with white noise and that is it no songs or lullabies. Now you can use the Bluetooth and buy songs and lullabies on the app. I already spent a good bit on this sound machine and I’m not buy lullabies. My phone will just have to do I guess. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Meaux

customer_reviews.title: Better than many I have seen or used in the past
customer_reviews.text: Good battery life, nice included sound modes and bluetooth. Love this thing, worth it. It is not all hard plastic but has a cushioned surround (grey parts of the owl)
customer_reviews.author: BAM501

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for son and his wife to use with first baby. They had been swaddling her and that worked great but she was getting to big for that and waking up with teething issues. This has helped baby sleep and also her parents. They are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Combs

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: We love this product! It’s a great price and the white noise is perfect for the little one. It has two options, one is waves crashing and the other is rain. The clip is perfect for the car seat or the edge of the bassinet so the noise is directed where you want it. The battery life is better than I expected, it lasts many hours (we haven’t had it die on us yet). We haven’t used the Bluetooth feature yet, but I think the kiddo will love having his own speaker that he can carry around once he’s old enough.
customer_reviews.author: TrumpetGeek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speaker for infants and small children
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough good things about this speaker/white noise machine. This is small enough to take anywhere and loud enough to use everywhere. It is durable and clips on very easily to nearly anything. The speaker charges quickly and lasts several hours when set to white noise. I will be purchasing this for every new mom I know.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Marks

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of crap. Every time the battery gets low for some God forsaken reason it changes sounds & plays whatever it wants. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY. I regret this purchase and am so annoying with it. Randomly wakes my sleeping baby because it’s random changes and poor battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great device!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We use it every day for naps, and so far it stays charged very well & only needs charged every few days. It is adorable, and I really like the 'waves' sound because it sounds similar to the womb, as far as I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Helps my LO fall asleep and stay asleep for long periods of time. Especially useful when going out in public or dinner parties where there will be lots of noise, it helps blur the sounds and keep her asleep. Best portable, easily rechargeable, and cute sound machine ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Daycare
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little version for daycare since we have the big version at home. It's loud enough to block out the noise of the other babies at daycare so my little one can sleep better. It's soft and fuzzy. The battery life is great. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: BookLover2012

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t give testament to the durability of this product as we just opened the box last night, but so far, it’s love! We are away visiting family, which usually means messed up sleep patterns for our baby boy. Miraculously he slept through the night last night and has had two great naps so far! The SoundBub is incredibly easy to use (thank you!) and overall great quality. I cannot wait to explore the depths of the VoiceShare app to be able to add more uses to this product.
customer_reviews.author: TheTeacherMama_

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this for traveling so I can put it next to my daughter. Nice nature sounds and has bluetooth capabilities. It's cute too. It clips around the railing of her crib nicely too. I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - WASTE OF MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever! DO NOT PURCHASE! It is cheap, the sound is distorted and includes frequent static. I figured, no big deal, as long as the white noise works, it will be fine. I used it for 3 days and then it died. I went to charge it, NOTHING happens, it doesn’t charge!!! I should have read the reviews. It seems like the charging issue is a common problem. This was an absolute WASTE OF MONEY! Amazon should drop this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen S.

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product when my baby was about 2 months. He’s now 13 months and still uses it. The volume settings are working perfect as well as the 3 white noise settings. I always keep it on the charge so I can’t comment on the battery life since it is only used for sleeping in crib. Overall it’s a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, until it didn't
customer_reviews.text: We loved this item, while it worked. Great for travel, recharges quickly, baby slept great with it. However it stopped working after 6 weeks of nightly use. Wouldn't charge or turn back on.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This fluctuates in volume and has static throughout, very faulty , not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: LGB

customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES IT. he’s a nicu baby. So he’s use to sound. From what we have noticed, he doesn’t like quite. So this white noice machine is nice and even peaceful for girlfriend and I to sleep better as well. We also move it to his car seat too. Which is nice it’s rechargeable.
customer_reviews.author: Bubs18

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great!! I recently used it for traveling with my son. I like the rain sounds. It is very loud! I had it at the lowest setting and it was just fine. The battery life is so long!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 month old who was going through sleep regression and best decision I ever made. I only use the white noise settings so I can't speak to the app or bluetooth setting, but I have slept more then 1 1/2 so I am golden with this product
customer_reviews.author: michelle martin

customer_reviews.title: My friend loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My friend was expecting, and I sent this to her as a gift. I asked her about it and her exact words were "I love this thing!" It's awesome when a gift works, AND they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: So I've just played around with it so far but I noticed when you adjust the volume the preloaded white noise makes abrupt static sounds also the white noise options arent that great only one is a constant sound. I thought it kinda stinks that it didnt come with a power cord as well..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for the price 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a sound machine for my babies. The sound quality is poorer than I expected, especially when used as a bluetooth speaker. I love the design and it’s ability to take a fall. Wish there were more sounds available.
customer_reviews.author: Lujain Hassan

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine, but the battery life is lacking.
customer_reviews.text: We run this all night long since our baby sleeps in the adjacent room. We don't want to wake her up since we go to bed later and wake up earlier than she does. If that's you too, then I wouldn't recommend this product. The battery only lasts for about one night and two naps before it needs a recharge. I cannot use this consecutive nights or it dies. Also, none of the sounds are a true white noise. The second sound comes close enough for us, but most of the sounds are more along the lines of nature sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellis NQF

customer_reviews.title: Not a white noise machine!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a white noise machine. This only plays three different types of wave sounds which the baby doesn't like.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica N Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Not paid for review
customer_reviews.text: We love it, battery could last longer but the price i paid, IM not complaining really! Lol it’sa great little player and helped my granddaughter stay asleep!
customer_reviews.author: April L.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! My baby girl is almost 4 months old and when I put her down for the night i make sure this is playing one of the three white noise options. And she sleeps well with this!!! Also for traveling its very useful!
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: Cute but stopped charging
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this but after about a week of using the owl stopped charging. I tried multiple outlets and charhing cables etc and nothing would charge it. And it doesn't have the option of batteries either. Disappointed I returned this and now only purchase items that are battery operated or have the option to use both.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and convenient. Perfect white noise maker when you're on the go. Fits on car seat and is also blue tooth compatible!
customer_reviews.author: Kali Finn

customer_reviews.title: Static when changing Volume
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift and absolutely love the design of this product (super cute and great size for carseat). When using the volume dial, sound cuts in and out and a lot of "static" can be heard that interferes with white noise sounds (additional noise that is not the white noise sound). Hoping that there is just a loose wiring issue in this one (and not all of them).
customer_reviews.author: emtastic

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My 18month old still used a sound machine when she sleeps so we got this one since it has a charging cord and we won’t have to worry about replacing the batteries while traveling. It has multiple different sounds and a volume control. There is a Bluetooth option to play your own music or sounds but we haven’t used that option
customer_reviews.author: Billie Jean Groncki

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Bluetooth doesn’t stay connected!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this product. It’s an awesome idea, but it doesn’t work like it’s supposed to. It will not stay connected to blue tooth and kicks off after playing a couple of songs every single time. This resulted in my daughter waking up screaming every 20 minutes, because she uses music to soothe her at bedtime and we wanted something that would play all night long since we were constantly getting out of bed to restart the CD player. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Whittington

customer_reviews.title: Best costumer service ever and great product
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with a small cosmetic blemish. However, I contacted WavHello and costumer service was absolutely amazing. They offered me to replace the product or to have a full refund, and went above and beyond so I would be satisfied with the purchase. Would absolutely recommend the product. My baby loves it and we carry it everywhere! The sounds are super relaxing and make my baby fall sleep peacefully. Is the perfect product and the best costumer service.
customer_reviews.author: NataliaR

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy but sadly you have to buy most songs and stories for it. On the bright side there is a BT only option that allows you to hook up to your device and you can always play lullabies if your own with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Stops taking a charge after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love this for our baby! At first it's cute, easy to use and charge lasts a couple nights. We use it to help get our baby to sleep. HOWEVER, The first one we purchased stopped taking a charge only a few weeks after purchasing it so we thought it was a fluke and returned it and bought another and same thing happened. For $50 this should not happen and really inconvenient. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this item
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item. My only complaint is the charging port. First, they only give your the charging cable, not the charging plug/USB cube. Second, since I got it, I've had issues with it charging. I have to plug and unplug cable from speaker multiple times to get the led light to come on and indicate charging.
customer_reviews.author: RedHaylo

customer_reviews.title: Not working properly
customer_reviews.text: Just got this yesterday. Only working when plugged in! The green light is indicating fully charged but the moment I unplug it nothing works. I went on the wave hello website looking for help and all you can do is leave them a “note” and wait for them to get back to you. If this worked properly it would be 5 stars. I guess I will return it, maybe it is an issue with the battery?
customer_reviews.author: julie justice

customer_reviews.title: Must have for baby!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Brought this to the hospital with us for the birth of our daughter. Baby girl is totally soothed by the ocean sounds. While in the nursery one night we had this in her pram; the nurse told us all the babies around our daughter were quiet and relaxed! Also love that this is rechargeable. The battery life is pretty impressive. We had this going pretty much non stop in our 4 day hospital stay and only needed to charge once. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Andriole

customer_reviews.title: Great product but bright light and clicking noise on sound adjustment
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Easy to use . However I hate that a bright light stays on during use. I wanted to use it for bedtime but the light is so bright, that and when adjusting the sound it make a very loud clicking noise. I plan on using it for non bedtime related times due to this
customer_reviews.author: -Kris

customer_reviews.title: Babies Room
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son, and he loves it for his little boy. Quality is great and works beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Ravensangelwings

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound machine for your little one
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sound machine, I have two different sounds, battery last forever, easy to adjust volume, quick charging
customer_reviews.author: Marius Sargunas

customer_reviews.title: Its a great sound machine, but...
customer_reviews.text: After using it for few months and loving it.... when trying to adjust the volume it starts to do the crackling or popping, sounds. Often wakes the baby up if I try to adjust the volume next to him while he naps...
customer_reviews.author: yana

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: This little owl is adorable. However, when it was listed as a white noise machine, I was expecting the literal white noise sound that other white noise machines make that resemble a fan (which is why I purchased it in the first place). This does not have that sound. Unfortunately I did not keep the box and have no way to return it. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: i was loving this until it stooped taking charge, ...
customer_reviews.text: i was loving this until it stooped taking charge, i contacted the manufacturer and they sent me a new one. However that one too has stopped taking charge after only 3 days. so im over it. i will have to find another white noise machine.
customer_reviews.author: Marlyn

customer_reviews.title: Baby sleeps great!!!
customer_reviews.text: The wave sound has worked really well for us, it muffled the outside noise and gives a soothing sleep routine for my baby. I haven't used much of the Bluetooth feature but being able to record a lulubye aka karaoke style was nice.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Love this sound machine
customer_reviews.text: Love this sound machine!! It’s perfect for attaching to the car seat or bassinet, etc. But it doesn’t play actual white noise - it plays ocean, babbling brook and one other sound.
customer_reviews.author: ATK

customer_reviews.title: Issues with charging port
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product at first because of the size and ease to take with, however we have used it for less than and year the the charging port connection has become so loose it does not hold the cord. The quality of the cord and port is low and is not made to last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: WavHello SoundBub, White Noise Machine and Bluetooth Speaker | Portable and Rechargeable Baby Sleep Sound Soother – Ollie The Owl, Grey
feature_bullets: NEW & IMPROVED SOUNDBUB AS OF JAN 2020! You made suggestions - we listened! Now featuring smaller and dimmer indicator lights, a silent volume wheel, 6 white noise tracks (including pure White Noise & Human Shushing) and a longer lasting rechargeable battery that will easily last through the night.

DESIGNED FOR CONVENIENCE: Whether you’re a first-time mom or fourth-time mom, there’s no arguing that ease-of-use is a key factor. That's why we designed the SoundBub with an integrated clip that attaches to any stroller or car seat and doubles as a stand for the nursery. And because it's compact and rechargeable, it’s the ultimate in portability and can easily go anywhere you do.

PROMOTES FAMILY BONDING: When paired with our VoiceShare mobile app, the SoundBub opens up a new world of family bonding across the miles. It allows you to not only play your own music and playlists, but also voice messages from grandma, a lullaby sung by dad while he’s traveling or even a recorded bed-time book read by a favorite aunt before bed.

CHOOSE A TIMER OR CONTINUOUS PLAY: No need to worry about your child waking up unexpectedly when the sound stops because the SoundBub includes 30, 60 & 90-minute timers as well as a CONTINUOUS PLAY option.

BABY GIFT REGISTRY & BABY SHOWER GIFT ITEM: Searching for the PERFECT baby gift for a new mom? Choose SoundBub for the upcoming Baby Shower or just a surprise. Recommended for infants, toddlers and tired adults;)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars888 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
